Message:
Let’s give him some
red clothes as a present
for always playing with us!

He’s not accepting my gift...?
I wonder why...?

He’ll accept it one day though,
right?

Ever since then,
Emma and I have been
together with him!♪

With him, we get to
play with lots of dolls!

One day, I really hope
you’ll wear these red
clothes for me.
